org.apache.gearpump.jarstore

Interface JarStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalJarStore

    public interface JarStore
    JarStore is used to manage the upload/download of binary files, like user submitted application jar.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.OutputStream createFile(java.lang.String fileName)
      Creates the file on JarStore.
      java.io.InputStream getFile(java.lang.String fileName)
      Gets the InputStream to read the file
      void init(com.typesafe.config.Config config)
      Init the Jar Store.
      java.lang.String scheme()
      The scheme of the JarStore.

    • Method Detail

      • scheme

        java.lang.String scheme()
        The scheme of the JarStore. Like "hdfs" for HDFS file system, and "file" for a local file system.
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • init

        void init(com.typesafe.config.Config config)
        Init the Jar Store.
        Parameters:
        config - (undocumented)

      • createFile

        java.io.OutputStream createFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Creates the file on JarStore.

        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file to be created on JarStore.
        Returns:
        OutputStream returns a stream into which the data can be written.

      • getFile

        java.io.InputStream getFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Gets the InputStream to read the file

        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file to be read on JarStore.
        Returns:
        InputStream returns a stream from which the data can be read.
